import sys
import math
t = int(sys.stdin.readline())
while t>0:
	count=0
	s=map(int,str(sys.stdin.readline()).strip().split())
	k = int(sys.stdin.readline())
	s.sort()
	temp=s[-k:]
	n=s[-k]
	cnt1=s.count(n)
	cnt2=temp.count(n)
	count = math.factorial(cnt1)/(math.factorial(cnt1-cnt2)*math.factorial(cnt2))
	print count
	t-=1
